name: Dawn Elliot
text:
Great prices, great pizza.
Wish I could call in for curbside but they only do that online... otherwise its lovely

name: Nikole Davis
text: 1st visit. Delicious pizza. Will try salads on next visit.

name: Pharon Campbell
text: Excellent service. The staff had my son laughing while we ordered. They refilled our drinks and brought us boxes. The whole restaurant was very orderly and clean. They have a variety of freshly made teas and fountain drinks to choose from. ‚Ä¶More

name: L D
text: This is a fairly new restaurant, at least to this area it is. The food was great and restaurant was clean. My only thought was that being a new restaurant, maybe the staff should introduce the menu or recommend a better deal on the menu to ‚Ä¶More

name: Tommey Liang
text: Great location as it is close to USF Tampa and many neighboring apartment complexes. The price has steadily increased over the years unfortunately, but the Build-Your-Own is still a good value. The employees are friendly and attentive just ‚Ä¶More

name: Sara Wortman
text: This was my first time at any Blaze pizza location and I really love the whole concept. Pizza is super affordable and the topping selection is pretty big. The staff was very friendly. Place is beyond clean. I ordered a normal crust pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Fugett
text: Pleasantly surprised by this chain. I got a meat covered pizza, and I loved the soda fountain. My brother got a cauliflower crust and I was expecting it to be gross and spongy. But it was crispy and tasted pretty good. The only reason I ‚Ä¶More

name: Carrie K.
text: What a great place!! The employees are so friendly and will put a smile on your face! Not to mention the food is fantabulous. The fact that you can get anything on your pizza for one price is just spectacular. I'm feeling excellent after a great meal and blazin' after the best service from Ben! Thanks for the whole store experience.

name: grey callejas
text: I've been here a couple of time and the service has been excellent, the food quality is great and the staff is super friendly. I like that you can also earn rewards with the blaze app. Shout out to Billy and Mike, they are awesome!! 10 out of 10 come here :)

name: The Non Roti Maker
text: Ordered the personal pizza for lunch. 2 of the same. The balance of the sauce and cheese along with the burn on the crust was good. One pizza however arrived without the toppings. Ordering and pick up was easy and convenient.

name: anniversary Brinson
text: Their pizza is really good. They make it right in front of you and it cooks fast. They have lots of toppings and different drizzles to choose from. I'm definitely coming back.

name: Lovely B
text: I was passing by and decided to give this place a chance. The customer service was great, and the pizza looked awesome, but I ended up having to throw the entire pizza away because there was a hair and a FINGERNAIL baked on top of my pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Britt Coley
text: Delicious is all I can say the burrito bowl is life. It was a Friday but was quiet food was made to order and the server was friendly too! I plan to take my kids in a week or so just cause I know they will love it!!

name: Samantha Brady
text: Blaze is my weekly pizza stop. They have gluten free options which is a must for celiac patients.  Rory is an amazing and bright young man who first greeted me on my first visit and I haven't forgotten him since. The entire staff is amazing ‚Ä¶More

name: Shawn John
text:
So glad to finally have a Blaze Pizza location in Tampa. About time!

For those who haven't been, Blaze is a fast-casual pizza joint that specializes ‚Ä¶More

name: Tynae Jones
text: There are so many wonder toppings and options! The food comes out quick and the employees are friendly. I love this place!

name: Andres Rodr√≠guez
text: Great pizza love the vegan options tasty and great atmosphere. Price good as well. I recommend.

name: PrettyLove Jones
text: The worst customer service this is my 2nd time coming here and may be my last. For one they have 20 people working but nobody comes to the line to take your order the manager has to ask who‚Äôs wants to work the line and they are all like not ‚Ä¶More

name: Morgan Shoulders
text: Great pizza and great service. Nick was a great employee and really made my first experience special. Really an employee to be proud of and deserves a raise and a half.

name: Christopher Mays
text: Excellent Pizza and service. Great selections of toppings and crusts to make virtually any kind of pizza you can think of. Priced nice too. Keep up the good work Blaze!

name: Torra Williams
text: OMG! I'm in pizza heaven. Service is wonderful. They have so many different toppings and sauces.

name: Chris Peguero
text: 1st time there and the pizza was so delicious and the crust blew me away with its thin crunchy crust. Toppings were flavorful and balanced.

name: Emma Dadswell
text: Went for the first time today and definitely recommend if you need a quick and yummy meal. The staff was great and super friendly. All of the ingredients looked fresh and tasted delicious. Will definitely be back for another meal!

name: Samantha Brady-Aguilar
text: I love this place. Rory is outstanding! Best gluten free/vegan/keto options

name: Nicholas Hodgkins
text: Gabbie M was great! She helped our group and made us feel welcome. She was very attentive towards our drinks and picking up our trash. She went above and beyond in service. The pizza is always great, but she really made our experience special.

name: Dat_anime_gorl
text: This place is a great atmosphere! Every single member of the team was friendly and went above and beyond! Angel was absolutely so sweet! We were made to feel as if we are part of the family immediately. Not only was my pizza made to ‚Ä¶More

name: CUBANAZO ALFREDO CASTILLO
text: GREAT EXPERIENCE WITH MY GIRLFRIEND AT  THIS PLACE.  AWESOME FOOD NICE PEOPLE AND VERY WELCOMING STAFF.  THE EMPLOYEE'S ARE FRIENDLY THEY CARE YOU AND HELP YOU IN EVERYTHING YOU NEED.  I JUST WANT TO SAY ...üòúWOW!

name: Elye Franklin
text: The service and speed is A1. Its lacking in other areas the crust is thin which is cool but i don't want that everytime. Their meat and cheese quality is good nt great bt what do i kno my kids love it. They make the pizza in front of u ‚Ä¶More

name: Its dabeauti
text: Blaze Pizza, Blaze Pizza!! I am completely blown away by the experience that I had here!! This restaurant was truly amazing from beginning to end! I have not had service like this in so long. Outstanding work. I will be back very very soon. All I can say is BLOOD ORANGE LEMONADE AND PIZZZZAAA   üòçüòòüíØ

name: Amanda gallo
text: Awesome pizza, awesome customer service. I love the build your own option, you can literally have your pizza any way you want with as many toppings as you want. You can't go wrong with Blaze. The app is really cool too. We used to drive 30 minutes to the Lutz location, so glad this one opened up closer.

name: Barrett Frazier
text: The staff was friendly and the service was quick. The pizza was a bit of a letdown. While the toppings are unlimited, you have to ask for extra since the amount they put on normally is on the light side. I also found the crust to have ‚Ä¶More

name: Rose Amaro
text: The pizza was a disappointment. Chintzy on toppings especially on a thin crust pizza, that eats like a snack not meal.

name: Jacklyn Campbell
text: First time here great food fresh and self ordered staff is upbeat and very friendly

name: Johnny Diamantas
text: Clean, well laid-out restaurant. The food was average in my opinion.

name: Rachelle Brown
text: This was our first time trying Blaze and it was amazing! I love that you can truly customize your pizza with different sauces, toppings, cheeses and drizzles. They had a good deal on 2 large pizzas as well! The delivery time was quick, they ‚Ä¶More

name: KRYSTAL LEWIS
text: Friendly staff and delicious food.  My kids loved building their own pizza

name: Jasmine Dodson
text: A little skimpy on the toppings, but super delicious.  The keto crust is perfect!!

name: shwmry hifnr
text: Never ate here, only pick up. Seems to be a gourmet style of pizza restaurant. Even offers pita bread pizza and gluten free -_-

name: Samantha Wallace

name: William Ramey
text: FRESH HOT PIZZA!!! CAN YOU ADD SEAFOOD AS A TOPPING AND DEEP DISH? I'M WILLING TO PAY MORE AND WAIT.

name: Jose Mejia
text: Decent if you are looking for a quick bite

name: K'Mara Johnson
text: Pretty good new pizza chain, husband enjoyed his a little more than I did but still was fresh! Will return.

name: Petra Cardoso
text: I paid $8 for the small pizza they offer and they STILL skimped out on almost all ingredients. Pitiful. My pizza was supposed to have chicken on it. They put tiny pieces and almost none of them. Attached pictures to show how little chicken they put.

name: Stevie Cox
text: They have great keto pizza!! The staff is awesome! I have a feeling I‚Äôm going to spend way to much money here.

name: Zach
text: Staff very attentive and friendly. Pizza ingredients fresh and crust nice and crispy. Will for sure be coming back. Also they don‚Äôt want to say it (for business reasons) but for those who haven‚Äôt been to a Blaze pizza before, it‚Äôs essentially a chipotle but for pizza.

name: Johanna Lainez
text: Great pizza. You can order ahead or at the rest and it's cooked so fast! Friendly staff

name: Megan Charland
text: Our first time at this Blaze location was fantastic! Plenty of staff working with smiles on their faces. The pizzas were fantastic and we‚Äôll definitely be back! My only complaint is that this location didn‚Äôt open years ago when I came to school at USF!

name: MyAccount
text: Excellent food! You can get a healthy pizza for a good price.

name: Velod
text: Sometimes they take a few extra minutes to complete curbside orders, but it's totally worth it. The quality of the food and the professionalism of the employees never fail.

text: The service was good and the pizza was tasty. I would recommend it!

name: Rick Furlow
